project.description: Fetches the test output from a test-runner slave, and stores it in the parent job's build directory on the master node.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PARENT_JOB
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The parent job of the test-runner job which spawned this

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PARENT_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The unique id of the parent job instance

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TEST_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The test id assigned to the test runner job that spawned this job

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TEST_HOST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The host machine for the test runner job that spawned this job

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: WORKING_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The working directory for the job on the remote machine, from which to copy the test_data/* files
